thread.title: MOBO Awards nominee inspires those hoping to follow in her footsteps
thread.title_full: MOBO Awards nominee inspires those hoping to follow in her footsteps | Calendar - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: MOBO Awards nominee inspires those hoping to follow in her footsteps
text:
It's not long now until the MOBO Awards - which celebrates music of black origin - are staged in Leeds.
While the event rewards talent from across the world, for one of the nominees it's going to mean a journey back to the place where she first learned her craft.
Andreya Triana studied music technology at Leeds Beckett University and recently came back to give a talk to the students hoping to follow in her footsteps.
Adam Fowler reports:
Play video Last updated Fri 9 Oct 2015 Entertainment Leeds West Yorkshire
